titleStmt.title: Ad fraternam communionem inter evangelicas ecclesias restaurandam adhortatio in eo fundata, quòd non dissentiant in ullo fundamentali catholicæ fidei articulo. Per Reverendum in Christo patrem, Johann. Davenantium Episcopum Sarisburiensem.
titleStmt.author: Davenant, John, ca. 1572-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Ex officina Rogeri Danielis almæ Academiæ typographi,

notesStmt.note: Includes a reprint of Davenant's contribution to: De pace inter evangelicos procuranda sententiae quatuor.
The roman numeral date is made with turned C's.
Running title reads: D. Davenantii ad pacem eccl. adhortatio.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
